data.title: Russian Language Centre
data.text:
Russian Made Clear, our core book for beginners, is practical, enjoyable and easy to use. Most importantly â€“ it works.

Russian Made Clear takes students from beginner to beyond A1 level, and covers approximately 150 full hours of tuition. It comes with audio files available for download, along with a huge range of supplementary online exercises.

With a clear and elegant design, Russian Made Clear combines academic rigour with wit and a sense of humour. Please click on the links to read more about the book and see sample pages.

The second book in the series is currently used internally at RLC and is due for publication in Autumn 2024. It covers an additional 200+ hours of tuition and takes students up to B1 level.

At more advanced levels (B1+) we make use of authentic materials and an extensive library of textbooks built up over twenty years. Many of these books are available only in Russia.
